messages.content: What is the latest version of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn?
The latest version of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn is Version 2.2, which was released on 20.12.2023.
What new features were added in Version 2.2 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn?
In Version 2.2 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn, a model pose library option and an acne option were added. Additionally, bug fixes and optimizations were implemented.
What new options were added in Version 2.1 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn?

In Version 2.1 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn, options for body type, wrinkles, beard, and tanned skin were added. A new workflow with 2 groups of ControlNet nodes for pose and hand control was also introduced, along with examples.
What major updates were included in Version 2.0 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn?

Version 2.0 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn added some new options, an upscaler in the workflow, ControlNet in the workflow for pose control, example files in PNG format, as well as bug fixes and optimizations.
What changes were made in Version 1.5 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn?

In Version 1.5 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn, the nationality list was updated to include 193 options. New options for face shape, facial expression, facial asymmetry, and dimples were added. Bug fixes and optimizations were also implemented.
When was the first release of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn?
The first release of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn was on 13.12.2023.
Were there any updates made to comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn on 15.12.2023?
Yes, on 15.12.2023, bug fixes and optimizations were made to comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn.
ComfyUI Portrait Master 简体中文版是什么?
ComfyUI Portrait Master 简体中文版是一个人物肖像提示词生成模块，用于优化肖像生成，选择永远比填空更适合人类。
ComfyUI Portrait Master 简体中文版目前的最新版本是多少?
ComfyUI Portrait Master 简体中文版的最新版本是V2.2。
V2.2版中新增了哪些参数?
V2.2版中新增了6项参数，包括体型、姿势、胡子、痘痘、皱纹和小麦色肤色。
ComfyUI Portrait Master 简体中文版支持多少个国家的国籍选择?
ComfyUI Portrait Master 简体中文版支持193个国家的国籍选择。
该模块支持哪些体型选择?
ComfyUI Portrait Master 简体中文版支持瘦、正常、超重等4种体型选择。
使用ComfyUI Portrait Master 简体中文版有什么建议?
建议不要满铺所有参数，因为随着提示词增多，每项参数的最终效果可能会被削弱。另外，为了实现完美的姿势控制，建议配合ControlNet使用，并将镜头类型设置为空。
如何安装ComfyUI Portrait Master 简体中文版?
推荐使用ComfyUI Manager安装，或者可以手动安装：1. `cd custom_nodes` 2. `git clone https://github.com/ZHO-ZHO-ZHO/comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn.git` 3. 重启ComfyUI。
ComfyUI Portrait Master 简体中文版的参数包括哪些方面?
参数包括镜头类型、性别、国籍、体型、姿势、眼睛颜色、面部表情、脸型、发型、头发颜色、胡子、灯光类型、灯光方向等多个方面。
